settings.title: Shipping Information
settings.description:
1. Shipping Methods
a. We offer several shipping options for your convenience. Please review the available methods during the checkout process.
b. Shipping costs are calculated based on your location, selected shipping method, and order weight.

c. We offer Free Shipping to the following countries:
Canada, United States, United Kingdom, Australia, Ireland, New Zealand, Sweden, Switzerland, United Arab Emirates, France, Germany, Austria, Belgium, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Italy, and Norway.

d. If your country is not on the list above, please contact us for shipping information.

2. Estimated Delivery Times
a. Estimated delivery times vary depending on your location and the shipping method chosen.

3. Shipping Issues
a. If you encounter any issues with your shipment, please contact our customer support team for assistance.
